content: There was an idea to have a support group meeting about Dataverse Metadata Block Definitions and share some ideas and work that has been done in the recent past with and for those during today's meeting of the German Dataverse Interest Group. Would there be interest here about this as well? (Meeting language would be EN :flag_united_kingdom:)

I'm always happy to talk about this stuff. :happy:

I think I'm a little thrown off by the term "support group". Would it meet regularly? How often?

In addition, I'd be happy to dedicate a community call to this topic. Currently, we have pretty full agendas through April 18 but after that there's availability: https://dataverse.org/community-calls . Please just let me know!
